qas.question: What is the name given to the district that is associated with the motion picture industry?
Which city does the Hollywood district belong to?
Other than the motion picture and television industry, what other major industry is centered in Los Angeles?
Other than Universal and Warner Brothers, what other company runs a major record company?

plausible_answers.text: The motion picture, television, and music industry

qas.question: What three industries are centered in Hollywood?
Where is Los Angeles a district of?

plausible_answers.text: The Walt Disney Company (which also owns ABC), Sony Pictures, Universal, MGM, Paramount Pictures, 20th Century Fox, and Warner Brothers.

qas.question: What major companies are headquartered in Los Angeles?

context: <b6_0>The motion picture, television, and <a3_0>music<a3_0/> industry<b6_0/> is centered on the <a1_1>Los Angeles<a1_1/> in southern California. <a0_0><a0_1><a0_2><b7_0>Hollywood<b7_0/><a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/>, a district within <a1_0><a1_2>Los Angeles<a1_2/><a1_0/>, is also a name associated with the motion picture industry. Headquartered in southern California are <a2_0><a2_1><a2_2><b5_0><b8_0>The Walt Disney Company<b5_0/><a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/> (which also owns ABC), Sony Pictures, Universal, MGM, Paramount Pictures, 20th Century Fox, and Warner Brothers.<b8_0/> Universal, Warner Brothers, and <a4_0><a4_1><a4_2>Sony<a4_2/><a4_1/><a4_0/> also run <a3_1>major record companies<a3_1/> as well.
